value:
The Order of Heroes' uniforms are
amazing... That gleaming white? It's
inspirational.$k$pI'd add my own touches, of course.
Maybe I'd line the cape with soft rose
silk...

I was raised in the Deeprealms to
keep me safe from war.$k$pFocusing on my sewing helped me
work through the loneliness I felt, not
being able to see my parents.

If you get injured or tear your clothes,
call on me. Mending bones and outfits
are two of my specialties.

Would you like to gather herbs with
me? Or maybe we can go shopping
for accessories...$k$pReally, I'd just like the chance to have
a nice, long chat with you.

I've been watching everybody as they
come and go... It's fun to spy out all
the different clothing they wear.

Pardon the intrusion! I've been
handed a letter just for you, from
$Nf.
This may call for a new look soon!

My inner strength is really
blossoming.
I know I can do better than that.

Well, this is lovely. Do you think
it suits me?

It's good to meet you. I am Forrest,
Leo's son. I will do my best to uphold
his proud name.

...$k$pOh, my apologies. I was praying—it's
something I like to do. I'm expressing
my gratitude for being here.$k$pWhy? Because I was able to meet
you, of course. You've been so kind,
looking out for me, encouraging me...$k$pYou've stayed at my side when things
get tough. That's how I got interested
in the Order of Heroes' uniforms.$k$pI watch out for you for one reason—it
means that I care about you! I'd be
happy to stay by your side.
はいっ
それっ
ひゃあっ！
卑劣な…！
I'm stunning. You're dead.
Can't run. Can't hide.
What a shame.
Don't take this personally.
Red stains...they spread...
Heehee
Feel better!
I can mend your clothes!
Be honest. My outfit… Too much, or not enough?
There's a bunch of equipment lying around. Do you need me to move it for you?
You know, I think some ruffles would really liven up that robe of yours!
Someday, it'll fall to me to wield Father's weapon, Brynhildr. I'll need to be ready.
I could never leave someone to die. It doesn't matter what the situation is. I refuse to bring shame on the Nohrian royal family!
Yes?
Forrest is here!
Together!
